title: NVIDIA's Recent Financial Performance and Analyst Outlook
body:
**NVIDIA Reports Strong Q4 Fiscal 2025 Results**

On February 26, 2025, NVIDIA announced its financial results for the fourth quarter and fiscal year 2025. The company reported a record quarterly revenue of $39.3 billion, marking a 12% increase from the previous quarter and a 78% rise year-over-year. Data Center revenue reached $35.6 billion, up 16% sequentially and 93% from the same period last year. For the full fiscal year, NVIDIA achieved a record revenue of $130.5 billion, representing a 114% increase from the prior year. GAAP earnings per diluted share for the quarter were $0.89, up 14% from Q3 and 82% year-over-year. ([nvidianews.nvidia.com](https://nvidianews.nvidia.com/news/nvidia-announces-financial-results-for-fourth-quarter-and-fiscal-2025?utm_source=openai))

**Analyst Adjustments Ahead of Q4 Earnings**

Prior to the earnings release, KeyBanc analyst John Vinh raised NVIDIA's price target from $180 to $190, citing higher-than-expected supply of the company's Blackwell B200 chips. Vinh projected Q4 revenue of $38.2 billion and earnings per share of $0.85, slightly surpassing consensus estimates. ([investorwire.com](https://www.investorwire.com/investor-news-breaks/investornewsbreaks-nvidia-corp-nasdaq-nvda-analysts-adjust-price-targets-ahead-of-q4-earnings/?utm_source=openai))

**Upcoming Dividend Payment**

NVIDIA announced a quarterly cash dividend of $0.01 per share, payable on April 2, 2025, to all shareholders of record as of March 12, 2025. ([nvidianews.nvidia.com](https://nvidianews.nvidia.com/news/nvidia-announces-financial-results-for-fourth-quarter-and-fiscal-2025?utm_source=openai))

key_dates.title: Dividend Payment Date
key_dates.importance_for_price: The dividend payment may attract income-focused investors, potentially supporting the stock price.

key_points.text: NVIDIA reported record Q4 fiscal 2025 revenue of $39.3 billion, a 78% year-over-year increase.
Analysts raised price targets ahead of earnings, anticipating strong performance due to Blackwell B200 chip supply.
The company declared a quarterly dividend of $0.01 per share, payable on April 2, 2025.
